newsitem.title: UK: Kwik Save dives after sales warning.
newsitem.headline: Kwik Save dives after sales warning.

text.p: Shares in Kwik Save Group Plc were indicated 11-1/2p lower at 296-1/2p, after the company warned on current trading, dealers and food retailing analyts said.
Kwik Save said same store sales in the first seven weeks of the second half were six percent lower.
First half pre-tax, pre-exceptional profits were stronger than expected however, with the figure at 44.8 million stg against 44.2 million last time and with forecasts at 32-43 million.
"The profits were surprisingly good," said one analyst.
"But the sales picture remains dire and it is difficult to see how the company is going to turn the corner until the sales line responds," he said.
The company said that an increase in underlying gross margins continued from the first half and offset the effect of lower sales.
